name: biomorphic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having a form that looks like a living thing: The artist's recent work shows a fascination with biomorphic forms, especially sea creatures. Her sculptures employ a lot of curving, biomorphic shapes.
More examplesFewer examplesHis interest in natural forms was made manifest in his latest paintings, which contain biomorphic imagery. The wallpaper had a biomorphic pattern, with brightly coloured shapes that resemble amoebas and other cellular creatures. From a distance the rocks have a biomorphic appearance, some closely resembling animals at rest.
